name: An0m@ly
description:
An0m@ly is  a semi-classic RPG made with RPG Maker VX Ace. 

(I say semi-classic because the actual RPG I played was FF3, so I don't really know what defines the genre)

An0m@ly follows a young woman, Violet, who has recently been employed in the Royal Guard. I don't want to give away anything, but if you like stuff like AoT, this could be for you. 

The Demo covers the second section of the game, so any questions should be answered in the full version. 

Please comment if you have any feedback. 

Credits 

Music - Any song not in the RTP is made by Of a Far Different Nature 

There are some songs in the files not used made by these artists: 

Robert Slump, Farewell to Fear, and ONLAP. 

I'm not sure if these will appear in the game or not. Check them out regardless. 👌

Battlers - Aekashics Librarium

Everything else was either made by me or the RPG Maker RTP.
